name: telegram-chart-bot
description: Telegram bot that generates charts using AmCharts v4 and Puppeteer

scripts.copy-worker: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const srcFile=path.join('dist','workers','chartWorker.js');const destFile=path.join('dist','services','chartWorker.js');if(!fs.existsSync(path.dirname(destFile)))fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(destFile),{recursive:true});if(fs.existsSync(srcFile)){fs.copyFileSync(srcFile,destFile);console.log('Chart worker copied successfully');}else{console.error('Chart worker not found at:',srcFile);}"
